topic.title: How to scan a disk for errors
topic.text:
What is Scandisk?
Scandisk is a software utility that comes with the Windows operating system. It detects and corrects errors in the hard disk.
Procedures
From the Desktop double click on the My Computer icon.

topic.title: How to Back Up Files
topic.text: While hard drives nowadays become very reliable, there is still a chance that they will fail, causing you to lose important files. So its best to back-up documents, pictures and other data on your hard drive from time to time. To back-up a drive is to make a copy of files which and stored these in a seperately location from the original files.

topic.title: How to Scan and Clean Computer Virus
topic.text: A computer virus is a computer program that may affect your hard drive seriously. This may spread within your hard drive or from one computer to another computer using a removable device like CD, DVD or USB drive.
